description: This Java class 'GetLqiTableRequest' defines a request for retrieving the Link Quality Indicator (LQI) table related to Zigbee devices within a mock Zigbee core environment. It contains logic to execute the request, gather LQI data from child devices of a specified device identified by an EUI-64, and send the response.

classes.name: GetLqiTableRequest
classes.description: A request class to retrieve a table of LQI (Link Quality Indicator) data for Zigbee devices connected to a specific device identified by EUI-64.

classes.name: GetLqiTableRequest.LqiData
classes.description: A nested class representing individual LQI data entries with EUI and LQI value.

methods.name: GetLqiTableRequest(int requestId, String eui64)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a specific request ID and target device EUI-64.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Executes the request: retrieves child devices, collects their EUI-64 and a placeholder LQI, and sends back the results.

methods.name: LqiData(String eui64, int lqi)
methods.description: Constructor for creating an LQI data entry.

methods.name: getEui
methods.description: Returns the EUI-64 identifier of the device.
